about_the_game:
Dive into the oppressive mysteries of this adventure and survival game where each elevator holds a new challenge to overcome. You're trapped in a dizzying labyrinth of corridors and levels, with no choice but to venture into the unknown depths.


The Elevator of the Unknown:
Your journey begins as soon as you step through the doors of the mysterious elevator. Each press of the button takes you to a different level, where traps and treasures await. But choose carefully, as each floor is randomly generated, offering unique challenges with every playthrough.

Exploration and Survival Struggle:
Once the doors open, delve into the unknown and explore the dark and eerie corridors. Your main mission: collect as many items and as much money as possible while avoiding the monsters lurking in the shadows. Every decision counts, every step could be your last.

Cooperation as the Key to Survival:
Encouraging player cooperation, invite up to 6 players online to overcome obstacles together. Communication and coordination are crucial to overcoming the deadly challenges that await on each floor.

Customization and Creativity:
In addition to the struggle for survival, this game offers an opportunity to showcase your style. Customize your own lobby, turning it into a safe sanctuary where you can rest between perilous expeditions. Decorate it with trophies from your past victories and memories of your adventures.

Facing the Inevitable:
In this adventure, every death matters. If you fall to the monsters or deadly traps, you won't respawn until the end of the game. It's a fight for survival where only the strongest and most cunning will prevail.

Take on the challenge, explore the mysterious depths, and test your survival skills in a world where danger is constant and victory is precious. Are you ready to face the unknown?

content_descriptors.notes: Players should be aware that Under Walls may feature elements of gore, including scenes of dismemberment during confrontations with monsters. These graphic violence elements are integrated as part of the struggle for survival in a hostile environment and may not be suitable for all audiences. While the game focuses on strategy and cooperation, it may include intense and visually striking moments. It is recommended that players review the game's content information before playing, taking into account their personal sensitivity to graphic violence elements.

name: Under Walls

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10,11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 CPU @ 3.00GHz ; Shader Model 5
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Explore randomly generated levels, collect treasures, and evade monsters. Play solo or with up to 6 players online. Customize your space between matches.
